text: Sugar Land is a city in Texas. It is in the big city area and Fort Bend County. It is one of the richest cities in Texas. It is growing quickly. It grew more than 40 percent from 2010 to 2020. As of the 2020 census, its population was 111,026. It is here that Miss Teen USA Katie Blair lived during her freshmen, sophomore and junior years. == Geography == Sugar Land has a total area of 43 square miles. == People == Sugar Land has 111,026 people living there. ==Notes== ==Other websites== * City of Sugar Land Category:Cities in Texas
title: Sugar Land, Texas
